questions.question: What is the predominant color of the product's main body?
What geometric shape best describes the product's top surface?
What material appears to constitute the product's visible surface?
How many visible legs or feet support the product's base?
What is the apparent finish or texture of the product's surface?
Does the product exhibit any noticeable markings or patterns?
What is the general shape of the product's base?
Considering the visible components, is the product primarily a single unit or a multi-part assembly?
Does the product appear to have any visible screws or fasteners?
What is the overall impression of the product's design; sleek or clunky?
What is the visible color of the small central element on top?
What is the general shape of the product's profile viewed from the side?
Is the product's base consistently flat or slightly curved?
Are the legs uniformly sized and spaced around the base?
Does the product seem to be designed for a specific purpose, or is it generalized?
